data.name: Spider-Man (Noir)
data.description: Spider-Man (Noir) is a stealthy, Tommy Gun-wielding hero that grants additional damage to his allies while laying down heavy fire.

starItems.name: Spider-Man (Noir)
starItems.description: Spider-Man (Noir) is a stealthy, Tommy Gun-wielding hero that grants additional damage to his allies while laying down heavy fire.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage.

Gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.

<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color>, always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color>.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, always gain <color=#fff568>Evade</color> and <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>120%</color> Piercing.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to secondary attack
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to secondary attack

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
If the primary target has no negative effects at the end of this turn, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>220%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If the primary target has no negative effects at the end of this turn, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing to secondary attack

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If the primary target has no negative effects at the end of this turn, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>20%</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary target
Clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> from primary target
Fill this character's Speed Bar by +<color=#86e619>30%</color>

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> + clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>.
Attack the most injured enemy, ignoring <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, for <color=#86e619>320%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

If the primary target has no negative effects at the end of this turn, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>50%</color>.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>80%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>30%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
1.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
4.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the secondary targets
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> Piercing to primary and secondary targets
Apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color> to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>350%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>3</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.
Attack adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> Piercing + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> and <color=#fff568>Heal Block</color>.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > Clear all <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> from primary and adjacent targets.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target.

This attack cannot be counterattacked.

1.description:
On Spawn:
 > If Health is full, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This character's attacks deal an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage to any <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Swarm enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Damage.

2.description:
On Spawn:
 > If Health is full, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This character's attacks deal an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage to any <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Swarm enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.

3.description:
On Spawn:
 > If Health is full, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This character's attacks deal an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage to any <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Swarm enemies.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
3.nextUpgrade: When an enemy gains a positive effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>

4.description:
On Spawn:
 > If Health is full, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.

This character's attacks deal an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage to any <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Swarm enemies.

When an enemy gains a positive effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
4.nextUpgrade:
On Spawn in <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies

5.description:
On Spawn:
 > If Health is full, gain <color=#fff568>Revive Once</color> with <color=#86e619>50%</color> of this character's Max Health.
 > Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>.
 > In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, fill Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.

This character's attacks deal an additional <color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage to any <color=#fff568>HYDRA</color> or Swarm enemies.

When an enemy gains a positive effect, fill this character's Speed Bar by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
<color=#fff568>SPIDER-VERSE</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>25%</color> Damage.
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, gain an additional +<color=#86e619>50%</color> Damage for self and all <color=#fff568>SPIDER-SOCIETY</color> allies.
